author: Andrej-CMS
body:
Dear all,

this is the CMSDIST part corresponding to the PR cms-sw/cmssw#21751 for the backport of Sherpa 2.2.4 with OpenMPI.

Kind regards,
Andrej

PS: Not sure if this PR or  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3645 should be taken, since in the second one there seem to be a lot of commits that I didn't do.
title: Backport sherpa 224 with openMPI
